game_description: Volta is a new way to experience music. Transport yourself into the mind of your favorite artist as they perform live in an audio-reactive world. In Volta, the bass of the kick drum transforms into a ripple spreading across a galactic landscape around you - every note of a synthesizer triggers a multi-colored ribbon streaking across a vapor wave Sonoran desert - your favorite artist surrounds you as crystal fragments that literally shatter around you as the sing louder and louder. In Volta, experience itself is an artist's canvas - dance, play, interact and create alongside them in their universe.
review_1: The new way and new attractivity for the virtual reality.
review_2: Can't wait to see how this app grows. Loved the Imogen Heap performance and can't wait to see more live shows
